title: FuseSeven
content:
Hi;

I'm searching FuseSeven font. I didn't find in the internet.

Thank you for your interests.

[preview image](http://web.archive.org/web/20100618153115/http:/onelastgoodbye.net/fuse.jpg)
author: cemmozturk

comments.content:
FF Fuse 7 was a font package consisting of Crash Cameo and Normal, Fingers Bold, Illiterate, Mogadischu and Reactor.  
 [These are the only Fuse fonts currently available](http://web.archive.org/web/20100618153115/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_fuse_classics_1/), as far as I know.
